description: Housed in a recently renovated 18C mill on the banks of the Meschio river, this restaurant is run by brothers Giuseppe (front of house) and Adriano (in the kitchen), who serve top-quality cuisine ...
facilitiesServices: Air conditioning, Car park, Restaurant offering vegetarian menus, Terrace, Wheelchair access
creditCards: Credit card / Debit card accepted, Diners Club credit card, Mastercard credit card, Visa credit card
